metadata.synopsis: One-liner for Bhaal cultist in the sewers. Reacts to whether or not you are allied with Orin.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Make sure you have an agreement with Orin (it is not currently implemented) and go to -25; 22; 806 and click on Night Blade - S_LOW_Bhaalist02 - a8f0d3b8-2b55-4f1e-acf7-ef2767544d8a

0.speaker: Night Blade Kryss
0.text: It is but Lady Orin's word that keeps my arrows from your chest.

1.speaker: Night Blade Kryss
1.text: You serve the Dread Lord well. Orin's faith in you is well-earned.

2.speaker: Night Blade Kryss
2.text: Step away, lest I forget my pledge to Lady Orin not to put an arrow in you.

3.speaker: Night Blade Kryss
3.text: You do not belong here, heretic. Your death has been ordained.
